info.title: Ambee
info.description: Ambee fuses the power of thousands of on-ground sensor data and hundreds of remote imagery from satellites. Our state-of-the-art AI and ML techniques with proprietary models analyze environmental factors such as air quality, soil, micro weather, pollen, and more to help millions worldwide say safe and protect themselves.

updatedAt.description: The ISO timestamp of event in UTC.
updatedAt.title: Updated At

get.summary: Get current air quality current by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get real-time, hyper local air quality data for any location by passing the geographic coordinates.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

updatedAt.description: The ISO timestamp of event in UTC.
updatedAt.title: Updated At

get.summary: Get current air quality by postal code search

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: The postal code of the place to search.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO country code of the postal code entered.

get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get real-time, hyper local air quality data for any location by passing the postal code of the respective area.

updatedAt.description: The ISO timestamp of event in UTC.
updatedAt.title: Updated At

get.summary: Get current air quality by city search
get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get real-time, hyper local air quality data for any city by passing the name of the city.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city to search for.

updatedAt.description: The ISO timestamp of event in UTC.
updatedAt.title: Updated At

get.summary: Get current air quality by country search
get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get real-time, hyper local air quality data for any country by passing the ISO country code.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO country code of the postal code entered.

get.summary: Get historical air quality by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get historical hyper local air quality data for any for any location by passing the geographic coordinates along with period for which the data is required.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The tarting timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

updatedAt.description: The ISO timestamp of event in UTC.
updatedAt.title: Updated At

get.summary: Get historical air quality by postal code search
get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get historical hyper local air quality data for any for any location by passing the geographic coordinates along with period for which the data is required.

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: The postal code of the place to search.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO country code of the postal code entered.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The tarting timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

get.summary: Get most polluted places by air quality
get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get most polluted places calculated from among various countries. The API also provides location information about the postal code passed like country code, division, latitude, longitude, placename, state, city, etc.

updatedAt.description: The ISO timestamp of event in UTC.
updatedAt.title: Updated At

get.summary: Get least polluted places by air quality
get.description: Ambee Air Quality API helps you to get least polluted places calculated from among various countries. The API also provides location information about the postal code passed like country code, division, latitude, longitude, placename, state, city, etc.

get.summary: Get current weather by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Weather API gives access to real-time local weather updates for temperature, pressure, humidity, wind, cloud coverage, visibility, and dew point of any location in the world by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

get.summary: Get historical weather by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Weather API gives access to historical data for temperature, pressure, humidity, wind, cloud coverage, visibility, and dew point of any location in the world by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The tarting timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

get.summary: Get weather forecast by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Weather API gives access to daily, hourly and even minutely forecasts for temperature, pressure, humidity, wind, cloud coverage, visibility, and dew point of any location in the world by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Can be any of the three averaging intervals 'minutely' or 'hourly' or 'daily'.

get.summary: Get latest pollen by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Pollen API gives access to real-time pollen count - tree, grass and weed, by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

get.summary: Get latest pollen by place search
get.description: Ambee Pollen API gives access to get realtime pollen count - tree, grass and weed, by passing the place name along with period for which the data is required.

parameters.name: place
parameters.description: The name of the place to search.

get.summary: Get historical pollen by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Pollen API gives access to get historical pollen count - tree, grass and weed, by passing the geographic coordinates along with period for which the data is required.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The tarting timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

get.summary: Get historical pollen by place search
get.description: Ambee Pollen API gives access to get historical pollen count - tree, grass and weed, by passing the place name along with period for which the data is required.

parameters.name: place
parameters.description: The name of the place to search.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The tarting timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

get.summary: Get pollen forecast by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Pollen API gives access to get forecast of pollen count - tree, grass and weed, by passing the geographic coordinates.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

frp.description: The fire radiative power in MW.
frp.title: FRP

get.summary: Get current fires by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee’s Fire API gives access to real-time local active fires data by latitude and longitude for any location in the world.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

get.summary: Get current soil by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Soil API gives access to real-time soil moisture and soil temperature levels of any given location in the world by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

get.summary: Get historical soil by geospatial search
get.description: Ambee Soil API gives access to historical soil moisture and soil temperature levels of any given location in the world by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The tarting timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending timestamp of the period to search for in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: The longitude of the place to search.
